typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	movieName as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceSQLDatabase
sourceSQLDatabase alterRow(deleteIf($movieName=='Toy Story')) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> deleteRows
